lines.text: 'In and though, 1 and 2', I think you got a loose screw!

[about Slip]
He was a fat man for the FBI.

[during a conjugal visit]
I can't see you so good, Louie, stand up.

[to the guard issuing prison suits]
I know you don't have any say on the color, but I do need a 21 inch waist.
With all we know about this place, if we ever get out of here alive, heads are going to roll like bowling balls.
Except that Jenkins, his head is flat!
Oh boy! This reminds me of my kindergarten days! It was so long ago!
So long ago? It was only last year.
